headline.main: AFFAIRS IN FRANCE.; An Irrepressible Conflict in the Emperor's Household Curious Gossip Napoleon and Europe The New French Laws Miscellaneous Intelligence.

docs.lead_paragraph: I can tell you the real, or at least one of the real reasons of the Empress' visit to the British Islands. The truth has never yet appeared in print. All the stories about the state of her health and her excessive grief for her sister's death were mere fictions. Why were all the French papers ordered to say nothing of her departure, and why...

docs.lead_paragraph: The Clerk, JAMES TERWILLEGER, Esq., called the roll, and a quorum of the Senate being in attendance, Lieut.-Gov. CAMPBELL addressed the Senators as follows:

docs.snippet: You have met under circumstances of more than usual interest, to perform the high and responsible duty of making laws which are to affect the honor, welfare and happiness of millions.

docs.lead_paragraph: You have met under circumstances of more than usual interest, to perform the high and responsible duty of making laws which are to affect the honor, welfare and happiness of millions.

headline.main: The Duke of Newcastle on his American Visit.

docs.lead_paragraph: We gave on Saturday an account of the installation of the Duke of Newcastle as Provincial Grand Master of Nottingham. The following is the speech of the noble Duke at the banquet over which he presided. He said: After leaving this country he went to another, which, it was true, did not at present own the sceptre of Great Britain, and, therefore, throughout ...
